__e: Italians are a great people but they made a big mistake:
Only I don't come from the moon, and Italians like you aren't just lying down.
Italian men are just the sexiest, most romantic, most gorgeous men in the world.
And then one day the Italians showed up with the dope.
Every time we think that Italians have hit rock bottom... nope!
Tell me what I don't know. The FBI had him all of five hours before the Italian A.I.S.E. offered up a trade.
Or should I call the Italians and rescind my offer... and let them deal with your father?
You know, some Italians have actually opened up Italian restaurants And done very well with them.
You do not mess around with Italians and their families.
